description:
The discount code provided is valid for flight bookings made with Mytrip, Gotogate and
Flight Network between December 2nd, 2025 and December 31 st , 2030, regardless of
the flight departure dates. To redeem the discount, the customer must complete the
booking through the affiliate links provided by Admitad and its publishers and apply the
code on the payment page before checkout.
2. The discount code is not valid for bookings that include the following airlines:
AeroMexico, Asiana, Air Canada, Air France, Air India, Air Transat, IndiGo, Alaska
Airlines, American Airlines, Avelo, Copa Airlines, Delta Airlines, Etihad Airways, Frontier
Airlines, Hawaiian Airlines, Iberia, JetBlue, KLM, Korean Air, LATAM, Latin American
Wings, Porter Airlines, Spirit Airlines, Sun Country, United Airlines, Uzbekistan Airways,
Virgin Atlantic, WestJet, Silver Airways, Vistara, Air New Zealand, Philippine Airlines,
GOL Airlines, Azul Airlines, Neos Air, and Pacific Coastal.
3. The discount code cannot be redeemed for cash or credit.
4. A discount of 2% will be deducted from the base flight fare of the booking. The discount
does not apply to ancillary products or services, including but not limited to travel
insurance, checked baggage, seat selection, meals, taxes, or fees.
5. To activate the discount, the customer must access the website through the designated
affiliate link. The code will not be valid if the customer visits the Mytrip, Gotogate and
Flight Network websites directly or through any other source.
6. If the order is canceled by the customer or the airline, Etraveli Group reserves the right
to retain and appropriate any otherwise refundable amount exceeding the final price paid
after the application of the discount code.
7. Etraveli Group reserves the right to modify or terminate this promotion, including the
validity of the discount code, at any time without prior notice. By participating in this
promotion, you agree to these terms and conditions.
name: 2% OFF on the flights tickets
